languages.text: {n}Вы оборачиваетесь на голос. Соломон заперт в одной из боковых клеток. Помимо кровоточащей ссадины на лбу, он выглядит невредимым.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы оборачиваетесь на голос. Соломон заперт в одной из боковых клеток. Помимо кровоточащей ссадины на лбу, он выглядит целым.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You turn to the voice. Solomorne is trapped in one of the side cells. Apart from a bleeding bruise on his forehead, he appears unharmed.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы оборачиваетесь на голос. Соломон заперт в одной из боковых клеток. Помимо кровоточащей ссадины на лбу, он выглядит невредимым.{/n}

{n}You turn to the voice. Solomorne is trapped in one of the side cells. Apart from a bleeding bruise on his forehead, he appears unharmed.{/n}
{n}You turn to the voice. Solomorne is trapped in one of the side cells. Apart from a bleeding bruise on his forehead, he appears unharmed.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你转向声音的方向。索罗蒙被困在侧面的囚室里，看起来安然无恙，仅仅是额头上有一处流着血的瘀伤。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You turn to the voice. Solomorne is trapped in one of the side cells. Apart from a bleeding bruise on his forehead, he appears unharmed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你转向声音的方向。索罗蒙被困在侧面的囚室里，看起来安然无恙，仅仅是额头上有一处流着血的瘀伤。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Te vuelves hacia la voz. Solomorne está encerrado en una de las celdas. Aparte de una magulladura sanguinolenta en la frente, parece ileso.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You turn to the voice. Solomorne is trapped in one of the side cells. Apart from a bleeding bruise on his forehead, he appears unharmed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te vuelves hacia la voz. Solomorne está encerrado en una de las celdas. Aparte de una magulladura sanguinolenta en la frente, parece ileso.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sese dönüyorsun. Solomorne, yan hücrelerden birinde kapana kısılmış. Alnındaki kanayan bir bere dışında zarar görmemiş görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You turn to the voice. Solomorne is trapped in one of the side cells. Apart from a bleeding bruise on his forehead, he appears unharmed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sese dönüyorsun. Solomorne, yan hücrelerden birinde kapana kısılmış. Alnındaki kanayan bir bere dışında zarar görmemiş görünüyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}その声のする方を向く。ソロモーンはそばの牢屋に捕まっている。額に血のにじんだあざがあることを別にすれば、彼に怪我はないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You turn to the voice. Solomorne is trapped in one of the side cells. Apart from a bleeding bruise on his forehead, he appears unharmed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その声のする方を向く。ソロモーンはそばの牢屋に捕まっている。額に血のにじんだあざがあることを別にすれば、彼に怪我はないようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous vous tournez vers la voix. Solomorne est enfermé dans l'une des cellules adjacentes. En dehors d'une ecchymose sur le front, il semble indemne.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You turn to the voice. Solomorne is trapped in one of the side cells. Apart from a bleeding bruise on his forehead, he appears unharmed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous vous tournez vers la voix. Solomorne est enfermé dans l'une des cellules adjacentes. En dehors d'une ecchymose sur le front, il semble indemne.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du wendest dich der Stimme zu. Solomorne ist in einer der Zellen neben dir gefangen. Abgesehen von einer bluten Wunde auf der Stirn scheint er unverletzt zu sein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You turn to the voice. Solomorne is trapped in one of the side cells. Apart from a bleeding bruise on his forehead, he appears unharmed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du wendest dich der Stimme zu. Solomorne ist in einer der Zellen neben dir gefangen. Abgesehen von einer bluten Wunde auf der Stirn scheint er unverletzt zu sein.{/n}
